segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s dive into your pension details. Can you tell me who the owner of the policy is? Just to make sure we're on the same page here.
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, the owner is me, actually. I, um, I set it up a while ago.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And what type of pension are we dealing with here? Is it, like, a Defined Contribution or something else?
segments.client_message: Oh right, it’s a, um, Defined Benefit pension. I think I also have the policy number if you need that.
